Name: maximize_total_feature_priority
Description: Maximizes the sum of priorities for all features selected for implementation.

Name: maximize_total_story_points_in_sprint
Description: Maximizes the total story points of user stories completed within a sprint to maximize output.

Name: minimize_total_project_budget
Description: Minimizes the overall budget spent on the project.

Name: minimize_project_end_date
Description: Aims to finish the project as early as possible by minimizing the final end date.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence_satisfaction
Description: Prioritizes work that satisfies stakeholders with the highest influence level.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimizes the sum of severity levels for all active blockers to reduce project risk.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Aims to maximize the average story points a team can complete in a sprint.

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimizes the sum of effort for all tasks in a sprint to increase efficiency.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximizes the number of sprints where the primary sprint goal is successfully achieved.

Name: maximize_feature_value_by_effort
Description: A weighted goal to select features that offer the highest priority relative to their estimated effort.

Name: minimize_time_to_resolve_blockers
Description: Minimizes the time between when a blocker is detected and when it is resolved.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Aims to improve or maintain high team satisfaction at the end of each sprint.
